markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Embodied Dreadnought Subjectivity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3927) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 29</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cataphract Fleshwarp](/Heritages.aspx?ID=204) heritage

**Access**
You're from Nex

</column>

---

Your colossal might marks you as a behemoth, the pride of Nex's Fleshforges, and the heaviest ordnance is a child's toy in your monumental grasp. You're a dreadnought, a living siege weapon, albeit one that wields other siege weapons in battle as your endoskeleton and flesh toughens. You gain the [Hefty Hauler](/Feats.aspx?ID=790) skill feat, and your maximum Bulk limit further increases by 3, for a total of 2 to your [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) limit and 5 to your maximum limit.
name: Embodied Dreadnought Subjectivity

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Embodied Dreadnought Subjectivity Source Impossible Lands pg. 29 Prerequisites Cataphract Fleshwarp heritage Access You're from Nex --- Your colossal might marks you as a behemoth, the pride of Nex's Fleshforges, and the heaviest ordnance is a child's toy in your monumental grasp. You're a dreadnought, a living siege weapon, albeit one that wields other siege weapons in battle as your endoskeleton and flesh toughens. You gain the Hefty Hauler skill feat, and your maximum Bulk limit further increases by 3, for a total of 2 to your encumbered limit and 5 to your maximum limit.
